mapper.select: SELECT QA.*, U.user_id FROM qa_question QA JOIN jejuuser U ON QA.user_no = U.user_no WHERE qst_no IN ( SELECT qst_no from question_tag WHERE tag_no IN ( SELECT tag_no FROM qa_hashtag WHERE tag_name LIKE '%' || #{tag_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ||'%' ) ) ORDER BY qst_no DESC

choose.when: SELECT count(*) FROM qa_question Q LEFT JOIN question_tag QT ON qt.qst_no = q.qst_no LEFT JOIN qa_hashtag H ON h.tag_no = qt.tag_no WHERE tag_name like '%' || #{tagName} || '%'

mapper.select: SELECT Q.qst_no, Q.title, Q.qst_content, Q.qst_cnt, Q.qst_time, U.user_id, U.user_origin FROM qa_question Q INNER JOIN jejuuser U ON U.user_no = q.user_no WHERE Q.qst_no = ${qstNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE qa_question SET qst_cnt = qst_cnt + 1 WHERE qst_no = ${qstNo}
mapper.select: SELECT tag_name,H.tag_no from qa_hashtag H INNER JOIN question_tag QT ON QT.TAG_NO = H.TAG_no INNER JOIN qa_question Q ON Q.qst_no = QT.qst_no WHERE Q.qst_no = ${qstNo}
SELECT count(*) FROM qa_answer WHERE qst_no = ${qstNo}

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, ANSWER.* FROM( SELECT A.ans_no, A.qst_no, A.ans_content, A.ans_time, A.ans_like, U.user_id, U.user_origin FROM qa_answer A INNER JOIN jejuuser U on U.user_no = A.user_no WHERE qst_no = ${qstNo} ORDER BY ans_time DESC) ANSWER) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${ansPaging.startNo} AND ${ansPaging.endNo}
SELECT count(*) FROM qa_hashtag WHERE tag_name = #{tagName}
SELECT tag_no, tag_name FROM qa_hashtag WHERE tag_name = #{tagName}
mapper.insert: SELECT qst_no_seq.nextval FROM dual INSERT INTO qa_question(qst_no, title, user_no, qst_content) VALUES(#{qstNo}, #{title}, ${userNo}, #{qstContent})
INSERT INTO qst_file(qst_file_no, qst_no, qst_origin, qst_stored) VALUES (qst_file_no_seq.nextval, #{qstNo}, #{origin}, #{stored})
INSERT INTO question_tag(quta_no, qst_no, tag_no) VALUES (quta_no_seq.nextval, #{qstNo}, #{tagNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE qa_question SET title = #{title}, qst_content = #{qstContent} WHERE qst_no = #{qstNo}
